verbs.description: [ARG1: pittsburgh college student] [V: accused] [ARG2: of using names of exes daughter to obtain child porn a pittsburgh college students] is facing numerous charges after he allegedly was caught searching for pornographic images of young girls using the wi - fi at his school and at his mother house according to a criminal complaint investigators said they found 23-year - old timothy britton at pittsburgh technical college and took him in for questioning britton was later arrested and charged with 20 counts of sexual abuse of children and possession of child pornography according to the criminal complaint britton admitted to using several apps wi fi pittsburgh college kristina britton pittsburgh hmu sophie
